name: The Adventures of Ambages: Castle of the Goblin King
name_original: The Adventures of Ambages: Castle of the Goblin King
description:
The Adventures of Ambages: Castle of the Goblin King is an arcade game developed by IceValk Entertainment. It was originally released in 2009. It was published by IceValk Entertainment.
The Adventures of Ambages: Castle of the Goblin King is available on PC.
